solution_line_template: Mrs. Thomson spent ${total_incentive} x {food_fraction} = $<<{total_incentive}*{food_fraction}={spent_on_food}>>{spent_on_food} on food.
So she spent a total of ${spent_on_food} + ${spent_on_clothes} = $<<{spent_on_food}+{spent_on_clothes}={total_spent_on_items}>>{total_spent_on_items} on food and clothes.

Hence, she had ${total_incentive} - ${total_spent_on_items} = $<<{total_incentive}-{total_spent_on_items}={remaining_money_after_items}>>{remaining_money_after_items} left after buying food and clothes.
